name: Penelope
text: Finn... Mr. Yosef.. He blocked the nurse from injecting me with the bad stuff earlier. *sob*

name: Yosef
text: I am *grunt* ok. Give antidote to little girl. Hurry, I take you out of here.

name: Finneas
text: Ok Pen, you have to be brave for me. I promise this is the last time you will ever get hurt.

name: Yosef
text: Boy. It seems I am at my limit. Too many poison in my body. I cannot go with you. Go stairs.. You will find small door there.

name: Finneas
text: But- Is there really no way?..

name: Yosef
text: *shakes head* Do not worry me. I am sorry I could not help her earlier. *sigh* Take care of you and her. Go now..

name: Finneas
text: I.. see. Thank you. Thank you for helping us. I hope you can finally rest.
